entry.title: Saturday: Chance of flurries. High plus 3. POP 60%
entry.summary: Cloudy. 60 percent chance of flurries this morning. Periods of snow beginning this morning then changing to rain this afternoon. Risk of freezing rain late this morning and early this afternoon. Fog patches developing this afternoon. Snowfall amount 5 cm. Rainfall amount 5 mm. Wind becoming southeast 20 km/h gusting to 40 near noon. High plus 3. UV index 1 or low. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Saturday night: Chance of flurries or rain showers. Low plus 1. POP 30%
entry.summary: Periods of rain ending this evening then mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries. Fog patches. Low plus 1. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023

entry.title: Sunday: Chance of flurries. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. POP 30%
entry.summary: Mainly cloudy with 30 percent chance of flurries in the morning. Clearing near noon. Wind becoming northwest 30 km/h gusting to 50 in the morning. Temperature falling to minus 3 in the afternoon. Wind chill minus 10 in the afternoon. UV index 4 or moderate. Forecast issued 5:00 AM ADT Saturday 1 April 2023
